hackathon-description-text: The Office 365 REST APIs give you the flexibility to build delightful experiences for users around the content in Office 365. With services such as contacts, calendar, mail , groups, files, conversations, and more – you can build mobile apps that take advantage of data stored in companies corporate cloud.
hackathon-eligibility: You must be attending the conference. There is also a $200 discount code MSHACKATHON when signign up on the event web site.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: An Xbox ONE per member of the winning team with a max team of 4.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=5101 Great America Pkwy, Santa Clara, CA 95054, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The solution has made good use of Office 365 APIs.
The Solution does something that is unique and innovative.

hackathon-location-address: 5101 Great America Pkwy, Santa Clara, CA 95054, USA
hackathon-description-header: Build amazing Android apps connecting to the Office 365 API
